about_the_game:
Journey back into the abyss with "Backrooms: Eternal Shadows," an expansion that plunges you even deeper into the mysterious and twisted world of the Backrooms. As you step into the unknown, brace yourself for a haunting experience that transcends the boundaries of reality.

Venture into uncharted territories where the lines between nightmare and reality blur, encountering new characters whose stories will send shivers down your spine. The Eternal Shadows DLC expands upon the enigmatic lore of the Backrooms, revealing darker secrets and testing the limits of your sanity.

Traverse through desolate and foreboding environments that surpass the eeriness of the original Backrooms.

Expanded Narrative


Dive into an even more intricate storyline, as you unravel the dark secrets hidden within the Eternal Shadows of the Backrooms.
Encounter new Entities and old ones, each with their own chilling tales and motivations, as you navigate through uncharted territories.

New Environments


Immerse in atmospheric nightmares, where reality blurs. Uncover secrets, navigate eerie corridors, and face the unknown.

Epic Conclusion


Unravel the final mysteries of the Backrooms as you face a climactic showdown with the source of the Eternal Shadows. The fate of all who enter the Backrooms hangs in the balance, and only the bravest will survive to tell the tale.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace: Frequent depiction of violence, gore or mutilation, General adult content
